page.title: 01 OUR AREA
page.content: Our block is an attractive part of the Cotswolds. The Northern half is a tree covered valley while the Southern part is composed of well cultivated fields. We have two and a half villages on our block. one is Sapperton, the other is Frampton Mansell and we cover half of Oakridge. The main road from Stroud to Cirencester covers the Southern part of our block, running through some of the cultivated fields. Some of the fields have cattle or sheep in them. The villages of Sapperton and Frampton Mansell are older than our half of Oakridge. They are both mentioned in the Domesday Book of 1086. The whole area is popular with visitors who seek out its quiet rural beauty.
